Defines the Maximum Amount to be charged on transfers to which this Charge range applies. CHG.MAXIMUM.AMT is a NOINPUT field when corresponding CHG.AMT is input
Used for internal reference
A charge Code or "ALL" is defined in this field. This is an associated field of Chg Percent , Chg Ccy & Chg Amt.
Only alpha characters are acceptable.
If Charge code is entered as "ALL" only Chg Percent is allowed.
This is a multi-value field
Must be a valid record in FT.CHARGE.TYPE or FT.COMMISSION.TYPE or "ALL"
This is an optional field with the Format nnC or nnW where nn is a number from 1 to 99. An input of 0 is also allowed. "C" stands for Calendar days and "W" for Working days.
If no value is entered, then the value would default as explained below in a defaulting mechanism.
The values input in this field
would be defaulted to the Bill Contracts.In the Bill Contract, if BTTC value is defined (not null)
Value of 1-99 allowed suffixed by "C" or "W".
Defines the Minimum Amount to be charged on transfers which attract this Charge range. CHG.MINIMUM.AMT is a NOINPUT field when corresponding CHG.AMT is input
If the charge has is a percentage of the value of the Bill Amount, it can be specified in this field.
Optional Input

This field contains either the ID of a group of BL customers (as defined in APPL.GEN.CONDITION) or the ID of an individual customer preceded by 'C-' (e.g. C-100018).
A maximum of 12 characters may be entered.
Must be either the ID of a APPL.GEN.CONDITION with module as "BL.BILL" or a valid CUSTOMER number preceded by 'C-'.
